summary: Add workflow versioning support to the TypeScript SDK to enable code changes for running workflows, similar to Java SDK implementation using history markers or webpack bundling.
userImpact: Users cannot safely update workflow code while instances are running, blocking production deployments and code maintenance.
proposedFix: Three proposed solutions: 1) Record markers in workflow history like Java SDK, 2) Bundle workflows with webpack and store versions in worker directory, 3) Add versioning to module loader with version storage capability.
resolutionDetails: Implemented workflow versioning support in the TypeScript SDK, referenced in sdk-core PR #156.
keyQuote: Other SDKs support workflow versioning in order to support code changes for running workflows. We must add this functionality to the Node SDK too shortly after the alpha.
